markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unholy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=307)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 585 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon without a   holy  rune 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An _unholy_ rune instills fiendish power into the etched weapon. A weapon with this rune deals an additional 1d6 evil damage when it hits a good target. If you are good, you are enfeebled 2 while carrying or wielding this weapon.

<document level="2" id="action-188" />

**Craft Requirements** You are evil.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Unholy
